cookies_description_3: , we use cookies and similar technologies to ensure the proper functioning of our website and to enhance user experience. This policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and the options you have to manage them.
cookies_definition: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and to provide information to site owners.
essential_technical_cookies_description: These cookies are necessary for our website to function properly and allow you to navigate it and use its essential features. Without these cookies, some services on our site would not work properly.
session_cookies_description: They keep your session active while you browse the site.
authentication_cookies_description_1: Facilitate login and keep your session active, especially when using
third_party_services_description_2: , and the domain is provided by
third_party_services_description_4: to host and manage our database and
third_party_services_description_5: to store and manage the images you upload. We also use
third_party_services_description_6: to manage rate limiting and temporarily store recipe drafts through their Redis service. These providers may use cookies in their services. Check their privacy policies for more details about how they handle cookies:
manage_cookies_description: Since we only use essential technical cookies, it is not necessary to obtain your consent for their use. However, you can configure your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, although doing so may cause some parts of the site to not function properly.
policy_changes_description: We may update this cookie policy to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We recommend that you review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we use cookies.
contact_description_1: If you have any questions about our cookie policy, you can contact us via
privacy_intro_3: , we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect the personal information you provide to us through our website.
information_collect_intro: We collect different types of personal information when you interact with our website:
identification_contact_desc: Name, email address, profile picture (if you choose to provide it).
authentication_desc: Information related to your account, including encrypted passwords.
preferences_settings_desc: Email notifications, user level, and verification status.
recipes_desc: Title, description, images, category, method, preparation time, ingredients, steps, and any additional images you upload.
comments_desc: Comments you post on recipes, along with user and comment information.
images_desc_1: The images you upload, whether for recipes or profile pictures, are stored in
use_info_intro: We use the information we collect to:
use_info_1: Provide you with access to the website's services and features, including the ability to create and manage your account, post recipes, and leave comments.
use_info_2: Personalize your experience on our website, including recommendations based on your favorite recipes and preferences.
use_info_3: Communicate with you to provide support, send updates, or important notifications.
use_info_4: Improve our services and website performance through data analysis.
sharing_info_intro: We do not share your personal data with third parties, except in the following cases:
service_providers_desc_1: We use external service providers to host our website
service_providers_desc_5: to manage the images you upload. Additionally, we use
service_providers_desc_6: to manage request rate limiting to our website (
service_providers_desc_7: ) and to temporarily store recipe drafts through their
service_providers_desc_8: service. These providers may have access to your personal data to the extent necessary to perform their functions, but they are required to protect it and not use it for other purposes.
legal_requirements_desc: We may disclose your information if necessary to comply with legal obligations or in response to valid requests from public authorities.
data_security_desc: We take the security of your personal information very seriously. We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
your_rights_intro: You have certain rights over your personal data, including:
access_desc: You can request a copy of the personal data we have about you.
rectification_desc: You can request that we correct any incorrect or incomplete data.
deletion_desc: You can request that we delete your personal data, although this may limit your ability to use some services on our website.
opposition_desc: You can object to the processing of your data in certain circumstances.
exercise_rights: To exercise these rights, you can contact us at
data_retention_desc: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary for the purposes described in this privacy policy or as required by law.
policy_changes_desc: We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any significant changes through a notice on our website.
contact_desc: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy, feel free to contact us at

call_to_action_first_place_subtitle: If you reach the first position, you can request your free verification

events_description: Discover events where you can earn amazing rewards.
event_not_found_message: The event you're looking for could not be found.

delete_account_warning: This action cannot be undone. All your recipes and data will be permanently deleted.

new_password_must_be_different: New password must be different from current password
about_subtitle: Learn more about Jorbites and our mission
why_jorbites_description: A user posted this recipe that indirectly answers the question:
jorbites_description: Jorbites is a vibrant community platform where food enthusiasts from around the world come together to share their culinary creations, discover new recipes, and connect with fellow food lovers.
jorbites_mission: Our mission is to make cooking more accessible, fun, and social by providing a space where everyone can contribute their unique recipes and learn from others.
share_recipes_description: Upload your favorite recipes with step-by-step instructions, ingredients, and beautiful photos.
discover_recipes_description: Explore thousands of recipes from our community, filter by category, and find your next culinary adventure.
level_system_description: Gain experience by sharing recipes and engaging with the community. Level up to unlock achievements and recognition.
community_description: Connect with other food enthusiasts, leave comments, and build relationships through shared culinary experiences.
architecture_description: Jorbites follows a modern microservices architecture for scalability and performance, overcoming serverless limitations with specialized services.
developer_description: Jorbites was created with passion for both technology and culinary arts. Built using modern web technologies to provide the best user experience possible.
get_started_description: Ready to join our culinary community? Start exploring recipes or create your account to begin sharing your own creations.
no_search_results_subtitle: Try searching with different keywords or check your spelling.
no_search_category_results: Try removing the category filter or changing your search terms.
invalid_youtube_url: Please enter a valid YouTube URL (e.g., https://youtube.com/watch?v=..., https://youtu.be/... or https://youtube.com/shorts/...)
private_workshop_message: This is a private workshop and you are not invited.
price_description: Set a price for your workshop, or leave it at 0 for a free event.
ingredients_description: List any ingredients that participants need to bring.

contribute_to_community: Do you want to contribute to the community sharing your knowledge?
share_cooking_skills: Share your cooking skills and help others learn new recipes and techniques.
